title: Nitro Pro 8.5.6.5.Multi6.[Eng,Esp,Ital,Fran,Deut,Nederl].x86.&am
description:
Nitro Pro 8 lets you easily create industry-standard PDF files from almost any file format. And sharing is seamless: any PDF created in Nitro Pro can be opened and viewed on virtually any machine, and will display identically to what you intended it to.



*Create PDFs with a single click from MicrosoftÃ‚Â® Word, ExcelÃ‚Â®, and PowerPointÃ‚Â® files.

*Combine different file formats onto a single PDF, including spreadsheets, images, documents, presentations, etc.

*Easily edit documents: Add, delete or rearrange pages, modify page elements such as text and images, and much more.



100% Industry-standard

Any PDF file produced in Nitro Pro 8 can be viewed, opened, and accessed by users of Adobe AcrobatÃ‚Â® and other popular solutions.


Create from 300+ Formats

Nitro Pro offers a range of ways to create PDF filesÃ¢â‚¬â€ such as drag and drop, right click, or within the application Ã¢â‚¬â€ with support for 300+ different file formats.


Combine Files to PDF

Convert a collection of different types of files and then combine them into a searchable, easy-to-share PDF file.


Print to PDF

Use Nitro Pro 8Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s virtual print driver to produce PDF files from any application that can print.


Microsoft Office Add-ins

Easily create PDF files straight from Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint with one click.


Preset & Custom Profiles

Control file size and quality using three preset profiles (web-, office-, or print-ready), or create reusable, customized profiles.


Create from Clipboard

Create PDF files from your clipboard using the Snapshot tool, or simply a copied image.


PDF/A & Archival

Preserve the appearance of and access to electronic archives, by creating ISO 19005-1 compliant PDF/A-1b format documents.


Scan to PDF

Digitize paper and physical documents and create PDF files direct from your scanner in a single step.


Inside are the versions of x86-bit and 64-bit in the following languagesÃ¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹:
ENGLISH, SPANISH, FRENCH, ITALIAN, DEUTSCH, NEDERLANDS

INSTALL NOTES:

1. - Install the program, start it.
2. - Register with the following information:

USER ....: edmacri
S.NAME ..: edmacri
CIA .....: edmacri
SERIAL ..: NP8DA3X804061096720

NOTE: If you have problems when enabled (dll error), copy the file "msvcr100d.dll" where you installed the program (default: C:  Program Files  Nitro  Pro 8).

*You can also install Microsoft Visual C + + 2010: 32-Bit or 64-Bit

Ready!

------------------------------------------------

Use the keygen Lz0:

1. - Run the keygen.
2. - Clik on "Generate"
3. - Run the program, go to the "Help" tab and go to the option "About Nitro Pro"
and the option "Register", paste the serial number you generated with the keygen.
3. - You can use the info you want in the other fields (name, business .. etc)
4. - Clik on "OK".

Ready!
